item.description:
Topics to be disussed are from "The Busy Person's Guide to Preserving Food":

Root-Cellering, Freezing, Drying, Canning

Members interested in sharing what they know about canning, fermenting, curing, freezing, dehydrating, etc. are welcome to speak, and/or share information informally as we eat.

It would be appreciated if those with experience using any of these methods (or others not mentioned above) would contact Aalia, group organizer at info@ulcsclinic.com. Please enter "Meetup Member" in the subject line.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the table with the Meetup sign on it.

group.name: Back to Basics: Sustainable Self-Sufficient Healthy Living

item.name: Food Preservation
